SEARCH
Module edu.rpi.cs.csci4963.java.finalproject
Package edu.rpi.cs.chane5.networking.commands

Class Registry

java.lang.Object
edu.rpi.cs.chane5.networking.commands.Registry
public class Registry extends Object
Registry containing all registered commands in the program. The commands need to be registered in order of Connection.receive() to process the data into commands.
Acts as a singleton with a mapping from the command name to the command object.
Version:
"1.0"

      public Registry register(Command command)
      Adds a command to the registry. If an existing command with that name exists, replaces it.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      this registry
